channel.title: Racing on Weazel News RP
channel.description: Recent content in Racing on Weazel News RP

item.title: Gone in 60 Seconds, Los Santos Style
item.description: There was a lot of demand in the city for an opportunity for those with a lead foot and a desire to have their hair blown back for the citizenry to race. That time as come as racing has come to the city of Los Santos! Yesterday, the Mayor and his staff announced that the very first track, The Hollywood Hills, was opened in the city with sanctioned races, betting, winners and losers.
